00014 #ifndef SIMPLEARRAY_H
00015 #define SIMPLEARRAY_H
00016 
00017 #include "config.h"
00018 #include <algorithm>
00019 
00024 template <typename T>
00025 class SimpleArray {
00026 public:
00027    typedef unsigned int size_type;
00028    typedef T* iterator;
00029    typedef const T* const_iterator;
00030 
00031    SimpleArray(): m_data( 0 ), m_size( 0 ) { }
00035    explicit SimpleArray( size_type size ):m_data(0), m_size(0) {
00036       allocate( size );
00037    }
00038 
00039    SimpleArray( const SimpleArray<T>& copyMe ):m_data(0), m_size(0) {
00040       copy( copyMe );
00041    }
00042 
00043    virtual ~SimpleArray() {
00044       delete [] m_data;
00045    }
00046 
00047    SimpleArray<T>& operator = ( const SimpleArray<T>& rhs ) {
00048       copy( rhs );
00049    }
00050 
00051    void copy( const SimpleArray<T>& copyMe ) {
00052       if ( this == &copyMe ) 
00053          return;
00054 
00055       allocate( copyMe.size() );
00056       for (size_type i = 0; i < size(); ++i ) {
00057          m_data[ i ] = copyMe.m_data[ i ];
00058       }
00059    }
00060 
00062    void allocate( size_type size ) {
00063       delete [] m_data;
00064       m_data = new T[size];
00065       m_size = size;
00066    }
00067 
00068    void swap( SimpleArray<T>& other ) {
00069       std::swap( other.m_data, m_data );
00070       std::swap( other.m_size, m_size );
00071    }
00072 
00074    const_iterator begin() const { return data(); }
00076    iterator begin() { return data(); }
00078    const_iterator end() const { return data() + size(); }
00080    iterator end() { return data() + size(); }
00081 
00083    size_type size() const { return m_size; }
00085    T& operator []( size_type index ) { return m_data[index]; }
00087    const T& operator [] ( size_type index ) const { return m_data[index]; }
00088    
00089    T& get( size_type index ) { return m_data[ index ]; }
00090    const T& get( size_type index ) const { return m_data[ index ]; }
00091 
00093    T* data() { return m_data; }
00095    const T* data() const { return m_data; }
00101    T* release() { 
00102       T* returnData = m_data;
00103       m_data = NULL;
00104       m_size = 0;
00105       return returnData;
00106    }
00107 private:
00108 
00109    T* m_data;
00110    size_type m_size;
00111 };
00112 
00113 #endif
